name: URigVMFunctionLibrary
doc:
The Function Library is a graph used only to store
the sub graphs used for functions.

methods.name: FindFunctionForNode
methods.doc: Finds a function by a node within a function (or a sub graph of that)

methods.name: GetFunctions
methods.doc: Returns all of the stored functions

methods.name: GetReferencePathsForFunction
methods.doc: Returns all references for a given function name

methods.name: GetReferencesForFunction
methods.doc: Returns all references for a given function name
